item.title: Mochi Poll
item.author: han@console.so (Han Ngo)
item.description: Requirement: Features: Poll Creation & Management: Set up a poll with specific questions and multiple options and a deadline. To finish creating a poll user must put some token in the poll which will be divided for all users vote for the poll. Generate a unique, sharable link upon poll completion. User Voting: The Access link to vote opens for everyone Require authentication using Discord, Twitter, or Wallet to vote. Users can only vote once, can change vote but cannot claim another reward.
